name: @ckb-js-std/examples
description: Example: Write scripts in JavaScript on CKB-VM
author: CKB-VM Team

scripts.build: pnpm run build:index && pnpm run build:simple_udt && pnpm run build:lock
scripts.build:tsup: pnpm run build:tsup:index && pnpm run build:tsup:simple_udt && pnpm run build:tsup:lock
scripts.build:index: tsc --noEmit && esbuild --platform=neutral --minify --bundle --external:@ckb-js-std/bindings --target=es2022 src/index.ts --outfile=dist/index.js && ckb-debugger --read-file dist/index.js --bin ../../build/ckb-js-vm -- -c dist/index.bc
scripts.build:tsup:index: tsc --noEmit && tsup src/index.ts && ckb-debugger --read-file dist/index.js --bin ../../build/ckb-js-vm -- -c dist/index.bc
scripts.build:simple_udt: tsc --noEmit && esbuild --platform=neutral --minify --bundle --external:@ckb-js-std/bindings --target=es2022 src/simple_udt.ts --outfile=dist/simple_udt.js && ckb-debugger --read-file dist/simple_udt.js --bin ../../build/ckb-js-vm -- -c dist/simple_udt.bc
scripts.build:tsup:simple_udt: tsc --noEmit && tsup src/simple_udt.ts && ckb-debugger --read-file dist/simple_udt.js --bin ../../build/ckb-js-vm -- -c dist/simple_udt.bc
scripts.build:lock: tsc --noEmit && esbuild --platform=neutral --minify --bundle --external:@ckb-js-std/bindings --target=es2022 src/secp256k1_blake160_lock.ts --outfile=dist/secp256k1_blake160_lock.js && ckb-debugger --read-file dist/secp256k1_blake160_lock.js --bin ../../build/ckb-js-vm -- -c dist/secp256k1_blake160_lock.bc
scripts.build:tsup:lock: tsc --noEmit && tsup src/secp256k1_blake160_lock.ts && ckb-debugger --read-file dist/secp256k1_blake160_lock.js --bin ../../build/ckb-js-vm -- -c dist/secp256k1_blake160_lock.bc
